summary: Conduct WCAG compliance audits, implement accessibility solutions, and stay updated on standards. Communicate effectively, manage multiple projects, and consistently deliver high-quality results in a fast-paced environment.
Developed and managed a customer portal, collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, define features, and ensure high usability and reliability.

Developed and managed comprehensive web applications, ensuring seamless functionality and optimal performance. Proficient in creating REST APIs, designing databases, implementing version control, and utilizing automation tools for streamlined processes.

Managed Gcash App features, updated WordPress content, developed new components, translated designs to HTML, conducted unit tests for code quality, deployed event-specific themes, and performed performance testing for optimal user experience.
Prepared and presented new feature proposals, optimized legacy code, clarified uncertainties for the team and project manager, addressed bugs, guided junior team members, and built reusable code.

Developed and optimized features in a legacy project, addressed bugs, clarified project goals, mentored junior team members, created reusable code, managed project repositories, reviewed code contributions, and deployed projects using Jenkins with a Vue.js web application.

Developed REST APIs with PHP and Laravel 5, created a mobile app using Cordova, mentored team members, modernized legacy code, implemented efficient database schema, and built essential project features with Vue.js for the front-end. Conducted research for process optimization.

Developed PHP web applications and REST APIs using CodeIgniter, provided innovative solutions for efficient development, enhanced user experience with CSS/scripts, and designed optimized databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.
